BattleCardAbility.Desc: [On Scroll Up/Down] This page costs 1 more (up to 5)/less; add +2/-2 to min and max value to the first die on this page [On Play] Exhaust this page and add the first die of this page to the page with the lowest Cost in hand until used
[On Play] Remove all of the target's Light and unslot any non-0 Cost pages
